mainText: Today we truly lost a great innovator and person. I don't have a iPhone, iPad, or iPod but I know of the brilliance it took for Mr. Jobs to create such world changing products.  He is the quintessential American dream, from nothing to more than something truly amazing.  We should be so lucky to have just known him and to learn from him.  Learn that failure will not keep you down, hard work will take you places, and being something is beyond being rich.  I can confidently say if we all live like Mr. Jobs, the world would be a better place. Thank you.
author: Hanson
